DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A pattern of repeat behavior requiring little conscious thought._Oral; of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth._is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar._A break or fissure in a structure._Oral; of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth._A pattern of repeat behavior requiring little conscious thought._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.
